name: SetTaskConfig
description:
SET tasks assign variables in workflow state.

YAML Example:
  - taskName:
      set:
        variable1: value
        variable2: ${ expression }
        computed: ${ .a + .b }

fields.name: Variables
fields.description: Variables to set in workflow state. Keys are variable names, values can be literals or expressions. Expressions use ${...} syntax, e.g., "${.a + .b}" or "${now}"
